DOC.criteria: Provision sign date write informed consent study specific procedure include consent genetic research explore genetic variation CYP3A5 suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture Subjects body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 Abnormal vital sign ( blood pressure pulse ) 10 minute supine rest , judge investigator Prolonged QTcF > 450 msec shorten QTcF < 350 msec family history long QT syndrome Suspicion known Gilbert 's disease History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug
